zeldaRelics:GreenHat.NAME: Green Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b
zeldaRelics:GreenHat.FLAVOR: A hat that has been with you through everything, simply wearing it makes you stronger.

zeldaRelics:GreenTunic.NAME: Green Tunic
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b
zeldaRelics:GreenTunic.FLAVOR: Those who wear this carry a great destiny.

zeldaRelics:RedTunic.NAME: Red Tunic
zeldaRelics:RedTunic.FLAVOR: Fashionable and Fierce, this tunic stores great power.

zeldaRelics:BlueTunic.NAME: Blue Tunic
zeldaRelics:BlueTunic.FLAVOR: Fashionable and Sturdy, this tunic can take many hits.

zeldaRelics:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang
zeldaRelics:Boomerang.FLAVOR: Always come back, always picks something up.

zeldaRelics:HylianShield.NAME: Hylian Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Block is no longer removed at the start of your turn.
zeldaRelics:HylianShield.FLAVOR: A shield blessed by the gods. It will never falter.

zeldaRelics:MasterSword.NAME: Master Sword
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon picking up this relic, lose #r

zeldaRelics:WisdomTriforce.NAME: Triforce of Wisdom
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
zeldaRelics:WisdomTriforce.FLAVOR: With Wisdom all things are possible.

zeldaRelics:CourageTriforce.NAME: Triforce of Courage
zeldaRelics:CourageTriforce.FLAVOR: Even the powerless can do great things with a bit of Courage.

zeldaRelics:PowerTriforce.NAME: Triforce of Power
zeldaRelics:PowerTriforce.FLAVOR: Power is the last thing you need, but you still need it.

zeldaRelics:Navi.NAME: Navi
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random card to your hand. It costs #b
zeldaRelics:Navi.FLAVOR: A friend from ages past comes to lend a hand.

zeldaRelics:CouragePiece.NAME: Triforce Piece
DESCRIPTIONS: Power emanates from this but you need to gather all the pieces.
zeldaRelics:CouragePiece.FLAVOR: A piece of something greater. All your instincts tell you to gather them all.

zeldaRelics:WisdomPiece.NAME: Triforce Piece
DESCRIPTIONS: Power emanates from this but you need to gather all the pieces.
zeldaRelics:WisdomPiece.FLAVOR: A piece of something greater. All your instincts tell you to gather them all.

zeldaRelics:PowerPiece.NAME: Triforce Piece
DESCRIPTIONS: Power emanates from this but you need to gather all the pieces.
zeldaRelics:PowerPiece.FLAVOR: A piece of something greater. All your instincts tell you to gather them all.
